participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is a laid-back and fun-loving guy who enjoys gaming and whimsical activities. He has a quirky sense of humor and appreciates the absurd.
participant_1.background: i drive a ford pinto. i like donuts. i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is an environmentally conscious and socially aware individual. She is passionate about her beliefs and enjoys engaging discussions about philosophy and culture.
participant_2.background: i am a feminist. i buy only organic food products. i've solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i love social media especially twitter.
